data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Philautus (Amphibia: Anura: Rhacophoridae) from the Truong Son Range, Quang Binh Province, central Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Truong, Nguyen Quang, Hendrix, Ralf, Böhme, Wolfgang, Thanh, Vu Ngoc, Ziegler, Thomas (2008): A new species of the genus Philautus (Amphibia: Anura: Rhacophoridae) from the Truong Son Range, Quang Binh Province, central Vietnam. Zootaxa 1925: 1-13, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184786
